name: Drawn™: Dark Flight
description: A kingdom’s future rests in the light of three beacons. Can they be lit in time? Will the shadows be cast into light?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 702 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game crashes at a certain point very early in the game. I can see based on another review that it's a common problem with the game. I love this series and I think I may have accidentally purchased it on steam after already playing it on BFG. Oh well. It would be nicer if it worked...
